about_the_game:
Get Rich or Die Trying


In this gritty turn-based economy and combat game, you start with $2k in cash and a bold ambition: to dominate the NY drug trade and build a massive fortune in just one month. Navigate the shadowy corners of the Big Apple, using a keen eye for business, a solid grip on your ratchet, and a willingness to delve into the city's grimy underground to achieve your goal.

Entrepreneurship at its Shadiest


What are you selling? Everything from LSD, Adderall, Cocaine, Codeine, Ecstasy, Fentanyl, Heroin, PCP, Shrooms, Steroids, to Weed. Buy in bulk at low prices, sell high, and see your wealth skyrocket. But remember, the name of the game is subtlety. Keep your operations under wraps, stay on top of market trends with your beeper, and make sure you don't get busted.

Outrun the Law... or Outgun It


Officer Roidrage is always on your tail. Run from the cops, blending into the urban jungle, or choose to fight, using your Saturday Night Special, AK-47, or even a rocket launcher. Your fate hinges on your decisions - evade arrest, or risk it all in an adrenaline-fueled confrontation.

Dive into the Depths of New York in the 90s


Travel across gorgeous 3D levels in the heart of Manhattan, the bustling streets of Queens, a Bronx basketball court, the captivating boardwalk of Coney Island, a trendy Brooklyn rooftop bar, and the haunting beauty of Central Park at night. Use your trusty subway card to seamlessly move around the city, one deal at a time.

Live a Life of Pleasure... and Peril


You're not just about the hustle. Find solace in the arms of a lady of the night, but beware, such pleasures often come with their own dangers.

High Replayability


Whether you choose a 30, 60, or 90-day drug run, you'll always be aiming to beat your high score. Each run brings new challenges and opportunities, ensuring no two games are alike. Hundreds of beeper events keep the game fresh, so you'll always see something funny and new.



This game is for mature audiences only. Viewer discretion is advised.

We've got more BIG NEWS coming up... WISHLIST the game to stay in the loop!

content_descriptors.notes: Depictions of drug dealing, and violent battles against police. Text references to sex and violence.
